abstract: Detroit Tigers outfielder/second baseman Ryan Raburn has heard his share of fan criticism for his early-season hitting woes. But he's hearing cheers now for his bat.
snippet: Detroit Tigers outfielder/second baseman Ryan Raburn has heard his share of fan criticism for his early-season hitting woes. But he's hearing cheers now for his bat.
lead_paragraph: It's a common story in a long baseball season, a player once labeled a goat by fans after a slow start enjoys sudden popularity when he contributes a few key hits down the stretch.

headline.main: Once a Goat, Raburn Grows on Tigers' Fans
